characters: a brave little girl named Hailey
a wise and loving Mommy named Rowan
a mischievous Cherub from the Plane of Padding
a lost Jelly Baby looking for candy
settings: a magical forest where the trees have crinkly leaves
a secret pillow fort in the living room
events: had to be very quiet to avoid waking a sleeping Daycare Dragon
learned a new rule about being a good girl
got a surprise diaper change from a Draconic Care Automata
